ValidationRule.description: Sales Reps should not change the name of a Person Account.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( Name ), RecordType.DeveloperName = "IKOPRO_Home_Owner", OR(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "CARS"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "USRS")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to change the name of this ROOFPRO Homeowner.
